page.title: 01MURSLEY AND DRAYTON PARSLOW
page.content: {MURSLEY}IS SITUATED IN THE COUNTY OF BUCKINGHAMABOUT EIGHT MILES FROM MILTON KEYNES,TEN FROM AYLESBURY AND TEN FROM BUCKINGHAM. IT IS MAINLY A FARMING COMMUNITY BUT THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE LIVING HERE ARE NOT INVOLVED WITH FARMING.WE DISCOVERED FROM SIXTY FIVE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED THAT THIRTY FOUR PEOPLE WORKED AWAY,NINETEEN WORKED IN THE VILLAGE,THE REST WERE EITHER RETIRED,HOUSEWIVES OR UNEMPLOYED. {DRAYTON PARSLOW}IS ABOUT ONE AND A HALF MILES FROM MURSLEY.THIS IS ALSO A SMALL VILLAGE WITH A MAINLY FARMING COMMUNITY. THE COMMUNITIES ARE QUITE SEPERATE BUT INDIVIDUALLY VERY FRIENDLY.
